explains: n. 幸福，安康；（国家的）繁荣

sentences.en: Singing can create a sense of well-being.
sentences.cn: 唱歌能产生一种幸福感。

sentences.en: But it estimates Mexican well-being at 22%.
sentences.cn: 但据估计，墨西哥人的幸福感指数为22%。

sentences.en: Clara had never experienced such well-being in all her life.
sentences.cn: 克拉拉一生中从未体验过这样的幸福。
